website_summaries.verdict: The best value for traditional coffee mugs at a budget price; you won't find a larger set with better quality for a lower price.
pros: Sleek shape and fairly durable build
Fit well in most dishwasher racks
cons: Some consumers comment that they are on the small side

customer_reviews.title: Fake product, do not buy! See video.
customer_reviews.text: We have enjoyed Strawberry Street mugs in our home for a few years and we love them. We wanted to order additional ones on Amazon. Upon opening the box, we immediately felt the mugs looked different, specifically the mugs kinda looked dull. Then when we flipped over the mug, we found that the bottom that said "Strawberry Street" was sticker that peeled off easily. The original ones had them printed on the bottom of the mug. Who puts their brand name for a mug on a peel-able sticker anyways? You guessed right, the fake ones. Check out my video for the demo. We are returning them. These are 100% fake.
customer_reviews.author: Siva Kolappa

customer_reviews.title: 3 of the 12 were broken when delivered. And ...
customer_reviews.text: 3 of the 12 were broken when delivered. And as I reviewed the mugs, I discovered that they are not authentic 10 Strawberry Street! I have 3 authentic 10 SS mugs remaining from sometime ago. They are much higher quality and their logo on the bottom of the mugs is fired into the mug itself. These cheaper fake versions put a plastic sticker on the bottom of the mugs that emulate the genuine 10 Strawberry Street mugs. Needless to say, it is very disappointing to realize I cannot trust vendors on Amazon. There are more and more of these kinds of shams. Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Dru

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged package of mugs
customer_reviews.text: The mugs appear to be of good quality but received a box full of broken mug shards. At least few mugs appear to be completely crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Vladislavs Dovgalecs

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: The mugs are nice. Perfect for a nice size cup of coffee or tea. Nice size to decorate and customize. Unfortunately 2 of my mugs arrived broken. I reached out to the seller twice about the damaged mugs and haven’t received a response. I gave them more than a week to at least acknowledge my messages before leaving a review.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Byers, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: terrible mug set
customer_reviews.text: These take about 3 weeks to ship. I finally received them and four were broken. It was obvious that they didn't break during shipment. Its impossible to get a hold of the seller so I can get them replaced. I finally started to use them and realize that most of the unbroken ones have defects. The rim has small cracks or ridges. I wish I could get my money back. This was a complete waste of money!!!!
customer_reviews.author: cc

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: These mugs are poorly made and poorly packed. I highly do not recommend. My original order had some mugs that had crack lines on them and the handles are not properly aligned. I requested for a replacement order and returned the original set. The replacement came and had all the same defects. These are nice mugs but are not of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: mr.m

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect white.......
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let them fool you. I have had strawberry street mugs in the past. They were pure white. These are a more grayish color. Not the white I was wanting or expecting. Yes they do well in the micro wave and dishwasher. They were delivered with no cracks or breakage. I guess I should have spent the extra money and purchased from a more reliable source. Very disappointed having ordered 30 for a coffee cup hanger in my kitchen that really needed the bright white.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B,

customer_reviews.title: Fake ... not original
customer_reviews.text: These are fake ... they have a sticker in the bottom strawberry street ... strawberry street should be printed not a sticker !!!! Definitely fake ...
customer_reviews.author: MSHAKER

customer_reviews.title: Great for decorating, or using as-is
customer_reviews.text: These were the most affordable and functional option for a child's birthday party where they all decorated the mugs in oil-based paint markers using adhesive stencils and took home awesome personalized mugs. The leftovers we've appropriated for daily circulation for coffee and tea. They are pretty sturdy and you can't beat the price

customer_reviews.title: Dirty grey
customer_reviews.text: Received 12 cups - not 10. They are heavy, kind of clumsy and not white. They are white with a haze of dirty grey. Very commercial looking. They do not look good with my bright white Corelle dishes.

Want to know the best part? This set is half the price as Corelle, while being of a better quality. I'm so glad I bought these mugs.

product_meta.title: 10 Strawberry Street Catering Mug Set, White
product_meta.description: Size:MUG| Style Name:ROUNDCovering all the basics for a professional event, These boxed sets offer fashionable yet durable dishes that are oven-to-table, dishwasher and microwave safe. Cater to the masses with these convenient packs. While these dishes are Microwave-safe, they may become hot. Please handle carefully.
feature_bullets: Covering the tabletop Basics for relaxed meals with family and friends, these everyday dishes are oven-to-table, dishwasher, and microwave safe.
Cater to the masses with these convenient 12 piece packs.
While dishes are microwave-safe, they may become hot. Handle carefully.
Dimensions: top diameter is 3.25”, bottom diameter is 2”, Height is 4”
Great for art projects! Paint & bake or decorate with a sharpie.
Oven, freezer, microwave and dishwasher safe
